metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000122 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The UNIX IPC layer in WebKit, including WebKitGTK+ prior to 2.16.3, doesnot properly validate certain message metadata, allowing a compromisedsecondary process to cause a denial of service (release assertion) of theUI process. This vulnerability does not affect Apple products.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.17.92-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.17.92-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.17.92-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.17.92-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.17.92-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.17.92-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.17.92-1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
